title: Yet another femicide, but everything is repeated the same ...
content: Femicide in Taurisano, in the province of Lecce. Albano Galati, fifty -seven years e already known to the police, He stabbed his wife, Aneta Daelczyk, fifty years and of Polish origins, and also lashed out against the neighbor, who was injured, while trying to bring peace between the two who were fighting. The couple have four children and - according to the first testimonies - the relationships had already been tense for some time. They were separating.
